page.title: 11Golspie-A Day Off School.
page.content: Yesterday was a public holiday.I got up at 9.45am,went downstairs to the kitchen and let the dog out into the garden.I then got washed and dressed and had my breakfast of Alpen,juice and toasted cheese.I played my favourite tapes on the stereo till lunchtime when I had soup,toast and juice.Mum and I then drove to the clubhouse to play golf.We played 6 holes.I did not play well!We then went visiting a friend of Mum's for a while and I started weeding the garden when I arrived home.I took my shoes and socks off and my dog pinched them! Soon Dad shouted,"Tea." For tea we had spaghetti bolognese. After tea I watched a programme on televison called 'The World's Strongest Man' and then a film called'Hawk the Slayer.'
